original_text: For he that will love life, and see good days, let him refrain his tongue from evil, and his lips that they speak no guile:
korean_text: 그러므로 생명을 사랑하고 좋은 날 보기를 원하는 자는 혀를 금하여 악한 말을 그치며 그 입술로 거짓을 말하지 말고

sentences.original_text: For he that will love life
let him refrain his tongue from evil
and his lips that they speak no guile
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 입술이 궤사를 말하지 않게 해야 하라
